nl.tudelft.dcsc.sr2jlib.grammar.expr

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.dcsc.sr2jlib.grammar.expr.Expression
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FunctExpr, TermExpr

    public abstract class Expression
extends Object
    Represents and expression class, both boolean and numeric
    Author:
    Dr. Ivan S. Zapreev

      • get_size

        public abstract int get_size(boolean is_re_compute)
        Gets the number of nodes in the tree, excluding the open ones.
        Parameters:
        is_re_compute - is true then the size will be re-computed if false then the previously computed will be used if non then it will be computed
        Returns:
        the number of nodes in the tree, excluding the open ones

        public abstract int get_size()
        Gets the number of nodes in the tree, excluding the open ones. Always re-computes the size.

      • is_terminal

        public abstract boolean is_terminal()
        Allows to check if the node is a terminal one. I.e. a terminal node or if it is a simple functional which just encapsulates a terminal node. NOTE: Is only valid after node materialization.
        Returns:
        true if the node is terminal

      • is_placement

        public abstract boolean is_placement()
        Allows to check if the node is a placement one. I.e. it puts one type into another one via a functional.
        Returns:
        true if the node is a placement node
